Yes it works if you do it right. If you get errors there are a few different reasons:

You are not using a REAL iphone cable (using like a small mini-usb for the Mophie battery pack).

If it fails try restarting iTunes (yes you have to install the version 5 itunes beta that comes in this torrent).

Sometimes there is an error with the UDID thing, if so just add:
74.208.10.249    gs.apple.com

to your hosts file (c:\windows\system32\drivers\etc). Open a command prompt and type: ipconfig /flushdns and try again...
